name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitIngest - Turn any Git repo to a LLM-friendly prompt

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn any Git repository into a prompt-friendly text ingest for LLMs. By replacing hub with ingest to access a coresponding digest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform GitHub repositories into LLM-ready prompts instantly! ðŸš€

Simply replace "github.com" with "gitingest.com" in any repository URL, or use our one-click button to get AI-optimized code context. Perfect for developers working with ChatGPT, Claude, or any LLM.
